description.raw:
I recently moved all the homebrew formula in the `osrf/simulation` tap to a `Formula` subfolder to match the homebrew conventions:

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/commit/b77b0a674db0bf451bc9893873d04894a23a43d1

While attempting to release a new sdformat8 prerelease, the `generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater` job failed to find the formula path:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater&build=318)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/318/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/318/

This branch fixes it:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater&build=319)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/319/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/319/

While attempting to release a new sdformat8 prerelease, the generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater job failed to find the formula path:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/318/

This branch fixes it:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/319/

title.raw: check for homebrew formulae in the Formula/ subfolder, because they all got moved there
title.html: check for homebrew formulae in the Formula/ subfolder, because they all got moved there
